GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: adds topic to database and serves the topic

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: adds article to database and serves the article

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves one object of matching username

GET /api/articles:article_id.description: serves an article object with the given article id
